Suggesting new parts is one of the many things on the [thread=36863]What Not to Suggest List[/thread]. Please read over that (and the other stickies) when you have a moment.

In case you've not noticed, at present it is possible to reach up to Mach 6 with current parts already. What on earth do you need to go any faster for?

Mechanics and/or Robotics is also on the WNTS.

increase its size so all of its stats go up good or bad it all goes up according to the set scale like if i took it and made it X2 of normal scale so X2 Thrust X2 consumption X2 Weight... ect.. and make said scale system work with all parts if posible

Do note that due to the square-cube law and several other limitations, simply scaling all stats up/down linearly is unrealistic. One type of engine may lose efficiency when made 2x bigger, another may gain it. Enlarged landing legs wouldn't be able to support proportionally enlarged loads as well etc.
